(This is a reply to Icedemon, the Oblitercons' response to Icedemon charging 
them)

The Oblitercons:



The Oblitercons laughed as they saw Icedemon approach, all of them opening 
fire on him.

Dark One fired four plasma bolts off at Icedemon.

Breakdown fired a grenade off at the approaching Icedemon's abdomen.

Pyro fired three fireballs off at Icedemon's chest.

Hiss fired three fusion blasts at Icedemon's abdomen.

Scavenger fired 21 armor-piercing rounds off at Icedemon's neck.
